reviewText: Can't play this DVD on your DVD player because it is for military combat and for law enforcement officials. When I put the DVD into my player, it comes up with a message that says "Not able to play on this DVD." Plan to get my money back or find out why it won't play. I suspect it is only for law enforcement officials. Amazon needs to post this in large print or stop selling it to laypersons. Be careful Amazon...krav maga is not for everyone and the advanced portions of it are only taught to military and law enforcement officials not laypersons.

If you are a role playing fake fighting moron this is the disc for you!!! If you actually have an interest in Krav Maga and would like to learn more about technique and step by step processes then look somewhere else and don't give these guys any money.
If you have a training partner and some spare time there is some top notch technique here.  Alain Formaggio has probably forgot more about fighting than most people will ever know.
